module.name: ap210_laminate_assembly_design
module.keywords: module, laminate assembly, interconnect substrate, electrical, optical, sequential lamination

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of laminate assembly design. This data provides physical assembly information sufficient to allow communication of the arrangement of laminates in an interconnect product, and required interconnections among the materials assembled. The laminate design details are covered in other clauses in this part of ISO 10303. Configuration management information and design management information is provided.

inscope.li: items within the scope of AP210_product_data_management_arm;
items within the scope of Characteristic_arm.

outscope.li: detailed definition of a particular laminate assembly process
